thread.title: Germany school 'attack': Police investigating 'gunman on loose' in Menden | The Independent
thread.title_full: Germany school 'attack': Police investigating 'gunman on loose' in Menden | The Independent

author: Lizzie Dearden
title: Germany school 'attack': Police investigating 'gunman on loose' in Menden | The Independent
text:
Wednesday 22 February 2017 11:32 GMT Click to followThe Independent Online 
A German school is on lockdown amid reports of an armed man on the loose. 
Children were instructed to lock themselves in classrooms as large numbers of armed police and helicopters arrived on the scene in Menden. 
More to follow
